Installation
============

Prerequisites
-------------

HABIT requires Python 3.8 or higher.

Install from Source
--------------------

.. code-block:: bash

   git clone https://github.com/your-repo/habit_project.git
   cd habit_project
   pip install -e .

You can also download the source as a ZIP from GitHub:

1. Open the GitHub repository page
2. Click the "Code" button
3. Select "Download ZIP", then unzip and run:

.. code-block:: bash

   cd habit_project
   pip install -e .

Install Dependencies
--------------------

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install -r requirements.txt

Verification
------------

Verify the installation:

.. code-block:: bash

   habit --version
